title: BMMI03
description: Lidding foil is less than the set level.
reasons_remedies: The lidding foil gets low on the lidding foil mounting unit
Insert a new lidding foil reel on the lidding foil mounting unit.
Check the sensor and set it correctly. Refer Chapter "Maintenance" > Section "Setting the Diffuse Reflection Sensor"
The sensor is not working correctly.
Replace the sensor if it is faulty.

media.caption: Base foil Mounting and switch Foil Location

text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMI03
Error Code 03
Category: BMMI
Title: BMMI03
Alarm Message: Lidding Foil Low Level
Description: Lidding foil is less than the set level.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The lidding foil gets low on the lidding foil mounting unit
2. Insert a new lidding foil reel on the lidding foil mounting unit.
3. Check the sensor and set it correctly. Refer Chapter "Maintenance" > Section "Setting the Diffuse Reflection Sensor"
4. The sensor is not working correctly.
5. Replace the sensor if it is faulty.
Visual References:
- Base foil Mounting and switch Foil Location
